ADAX-FS2.sheet.title: Fading Suns Character Sheet
ADAX-FS2.sheet.skills.drophelper: Drag & Drop skills from the Compendium here
ADAX-FS2.dialog.select.label: Select Characteristic:
ADAX-FS2.dialog.roll.title: Skill Roll
ADAX-FS2.dialog.modifier.label: Apply a bonus (+) or penalty (-):
ADAX-FS2.compendium.skills.learned.label: Learned Skills
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.acrobatics.descrip: Allows complex body movements (somersaults, cartwheels...) and improves balance. Can be used to reduce fall damage.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.alchemy.name: Alchemy
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.alchemy.descriptio: The art and science of matter, allowing the concoction of elixirs and potions. Allows the identification of substances and their purity.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.read.name: Read
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.read.description: A 'tag' skill indicating the ability to read a specific language. Must be purchased for each language read.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.crossbow.name: Crossbow
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.crossbow.descripti: A 'tag' skill that qualifies the Shoot skill, allowing the use of a crossbow without penalty.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.archery.name: Archery
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.archery.descriptio: The practice of archery. Useful for hunting or combat on low-tech worlds.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.throwing.name: Throwing
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.throwing.descripti: Mastery of manually thrown weapons such as knives, throwing stars, or even stones with precision.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.artisan.name: Artisan
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.artisan.descriptio: Allows the creation and evaluation of the quality of objects in a specific field (Blacksmithing, Carpentry, Jewelry, etc.). A specialty must be chosen.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.arts.name: Arts
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.arts.description: The creation of works of art. Also allows for the evaluation of the quality and origin of a work. A specialty must be chosen (Painting, Sculpture, Poetry, etc.).
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.knavery.name: Knavery
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.knavery.descriptio: The art of talking one's way out of difficult situations, lying convincingly, or deceiving a target.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.academia.name: Academia
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.academia.descripti: Allows locating information in archives, libraries, or registers. Essential for research, especially on lost technology.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.bureaucracy.name: Bureaucracy
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.bureaucracy.descri: Knowledge of administrative machinery. Allows navigating paperwork, forging documents, or covering tracks.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.acting.name: Acting
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.acting.description: Allows playing a role, acting in an unnatural way, such as impersonating someone else.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.leadership.name: Leadership
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.leadership.descrip: The ability to organize and lead groups of people, identifying each person's skills to best use them.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.focus.name: Focus
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.focus.description: Allows achieving a state of deep concentration, useful for meditation, long tasks, or using occult powers.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.drive.name: Drive
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.drive.description: Allows piloting a given type of vehicle. A specialty must be chosen (Aircraft, Landcraft, Watercraft, etc.).
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.lore.name: Lore
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.lore.description: Expertise in a particular field of knowledge. A specialty must be chosen (History, Xenology, Geography, etc.).
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.streetwise.name: Streetwise
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.streetwise.descrip: Familiarity with the criminal underworld. Allows contacting criminals, acquiring illegal goods, or obtaining information.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.lockpicking.name: Lockpicking
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.lockpicking.descri: The art of manipulating and opening mechanical or technological locks without a key.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.debate.name: Debate
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.debate.description: The ability to present concise and persuasive arguments, and to find flaws in others' reasoning.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.disguise.name: Disguise
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.disguise.descripti: Allows altering one's appearance to change identity or blend into a group.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.beast-lore.name: Beast Lore
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.beast-lore.descrip: Allows understanding and training animals, whether domestic or wild.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.oratory.name: Oratory
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.oratory.descriptio: The art of invoking emotions in a crowd through speech. Useful for politicians, generals, and revolutionaries.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.empathy.name: Empathy
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.empathy.descriptio: The ability to discern another person's emotional state by interpreting their body language. Allows for lie detection.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.inquiry.name: Inquiry
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.inquiry.descriptio: Field investigation work. Allows obtaining and interpreting information and clues from a crime scene.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.ride.name: Ride
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.ride.description: Allows effectively riding and controlling saddle beasts like horses or similar creatures.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.etiquette.name: Etiquette
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.etiquette.descript: Knowledge of the unwritten rules of behavior of a social group (nobility, guild, etc.), allowing one to avoid faux pas.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.stoic-mind.name: Stoic Mind
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.stoic-mind.descrip: Allows resisting occult powers, especially telepathic intrusions, and masking one's own aura.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.search.name: Search
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.search.description: Allows conducting a methodical search of an area or person to find hidden objects, doors, or compartments.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.warfare.name: Warfare
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.warfare.descriptio: Covers several aspects of the art of war. A specialty must be chosen (Artillery, Demolitions, Gunnery, Tactics).
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.performance.name: Performance
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.performance.descri: Allows staging an artistic performance in public. A specialty must be chosen (Singing, Dancing, Music, etc.).
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.gambling.name: Gambling
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.gambling.descripti: Knowledge of the rules of games of chance and the most common ways to cheat.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.speak.name: Speak
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.speak.description: A 'tag' skill indicating the ability to speak a specific language fluently.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.think-machine.name: Think Machine
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.think-machine.desc: Allows using computers (Think Machines) to access information or perform simple programming.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.physick.name: Physick
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.physick.descriptio: Covers anatomy, surgery, diseases, and preventive medicine. May include cybernetic implantation.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.tracking.name: Tracking
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.tracking.descripti: Allows tracking prey by interpreting signs of its passage in the wild.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.remedy.name: Remedy
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.remedy.description: Provides the necessary first aid to stabilize a wounded character pending more complete medical help.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.sleight-of-hand.de: The art of concealing small objects or stealing them from a target without their knowledge, often by misdirection.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.tech-redemption.de: The ability to repair technological objects. A specialty must be chosen (Craft, High Tech, Mechanical, Electrical).
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.spacesuit.name: Spacesuit
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.spacesuit.descript: A 'tag' skill that nullifies penalties for wearing heavy armor (like a spacesuit) or for actions in zero gravity.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.science.name: Science
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.science.descriptio: The study of a scientific field. A specialty must be chosen (Biology, Chemistry, Physics, etc.).
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.stoic-body.name: Stoic Body
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.stoic-body.descrip: Allows ignoring pain, hunger, sleep deprivation, and torture. Can help govern involuntary bodily functions.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.survival.name: Survival
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.survival.descripti: Allows surviving in harsh conditions, far from civilization. Includes finding shelter, food, and water.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.torture.name: Torture
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.torture.descriptio: A means of extracting information from an individual by causing physical or mental pain.
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.xeno-empathy.name: Xeno-Empathy
ADAX-FS2.items.skills.xeno-empathy.descr: Allows interpreting the emotional state of a specific alien race. A specialty must be chosen for each race.
ADAX-FS2.dialog.manage.title: Manage Skill
ADAX-FS2.dialog.delete.title: Delete Item
ADAX-FS2.dialog.delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
ADAX-FS2.sheet.traits.drophelper: Drag & Drop traits from the Compendium here
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.handsome.name: Handsome
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.beautiful.name: Beautiful
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.angelic.name: Angelic
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.homely.name: Homely
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.ugly.name: Ugly
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.monstrous.name: Monstrous
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.monstrous.descr: -3 Charm in social interactions (unless seeking pity).
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.bold.name: Bold
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.bold.descriptio: +2 Passion when acting while others hesitate.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.curious.name: Curious
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.gracious.name: Gracious
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.innovative.name: Innovative
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.innovative.desc: +2 Tech when trying to invent something new.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.just.name: Just
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.loyal.name: Loyal
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.pious.name: Pious
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.shrewd.name: Shrewd
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.shrewd.descript: +2 Wits against attempts to be fast-talked.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.suspicious.name: Suspicious
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.unyielding.name: Unyielding
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.unyielding.desc: +2 Endurance when honor is at stake.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.bluster.name: Bluster
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.brainwashed.des: -2 Wits when confronted with something that disagrees with the character's brainwashed belief.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.callous.name: Callous
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.clueless.name: Clueless
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.delusional.name: Delusional
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.delusional.desc: -2 Perception when confronted with something that disagrees with the character's delusional belief.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.greedy.name: Greedy
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.guilty.name: Guilty
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.guilty.descript: -2 on all rolls when opposing Church officials.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.gullible.name: Gullible
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.gullible.descri: -2 Wits against attempts to be fast-talked.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.haughty.name: Haughty
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.impetuous.name: Impetuous
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.righteous.name: Righteous
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.mammon.name: Mammon
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.nosy.name: Nosy
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.phobic.name: Phobic
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.phobic.descript: -2 Calm around the source of the phobia.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.possessive.name: Possessive
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.possessive.desc: -2 Calm when cut out of the action.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.prideful.name: Prideful
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.secretive.name: Secretive
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.subtle.name: Subtle
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.surly.name: Surly
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.uncouth.name: Uncouth
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.unnerving.name: Unnerving
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.vain.name: Vain
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.vengeful.name: Vengeful
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.vengeful.descri: -3 Calm when honor is impinged, will never forget a slight.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.bad-heart.name: Bad Heart
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.bad-liver.name: Bad Liver
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.bad-lungs.name: Bad Lungs
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.limp.name: Limp
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.missing-arm.des: -4 Dexterity for tasks requiring two arms.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.missing-eye.des: -2 Perception due to limited field of vision, -1 Shoot due to poor depth perception.
-2 to all tasks for two turns after being wounded.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.ambidextrous.de: +4 to offset the -4 penalty for using an off-hand weapon.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.casanova.name: Casanova
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.compass.name: Compass
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.compass.descrip: +2 Wits when figuring out direction or location.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.eloquent.name: Eloquent
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.eloquent.descri: +2 Extrovert when swaying others through speech.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.fast-draw.name: Fast Draw
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.fast-draw.descr: +2 Initiative drawing and firing a gun in same action.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.hacker.name: Hacker
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.keen-ears.name: Keen Ears
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.keen-eyes.name: Keen Eyes
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.sonorous.name: Sonorous
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.sonorous.descri: +2 Extrovert when impressing others through speech.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.thrifty.name: Thrifty
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.bad-vision.name: Bad Vision
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.beast-foe.name: Beast Foe
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.clumsy.name: Clumsy
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.poor-liar.name: Poor Liar
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.quasimodo.name: Quasimodo
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.well-liked.name: Well-liked
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.charitable.name: Charitable
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.honest.name: Honest
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.hero.name: Hero
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.cad.name: Cad
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.scary.name: Scary
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.tyrant.name: Tyrant
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.dwarf.name: Dwarf
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.dwarf.descripti: -2 Vitality, base run = 6 meters, requires tailored clothing.
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.short.name: Short
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.tall.name: Tall
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.giant.name: Giant
ADAX-FS2.items.blessings.giant.descripti: +2 Vitality, base run = 14 meters, requires tailored clothing.
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.level.name: Name
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.alien-upbringin: Raised by another race. Starts with their Speak skill instead of your own.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.heir.name: Heir
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.heir.descriptio: Next in line for a position of importance (e.g., duchess, spaceship captain).
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.secrets.name: Secrets
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.secrets.descrip: Knows a secret of varying importance.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.well-traveled.d: Has been around a bit, and has heard a bit more.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.addiction.name: Addiction
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.addiction.descr: Addicted to a substance. Suffers withdrawal symptoms without regular doses.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.cloistered.name: Cloistered
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.cloistered.desc: Grew up in isolation, leading to social awkwardness and difficulty relating to others.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.dark-secret.des: Has a terrible secret to hide.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.infamous-family: Family has a bad reputation (thieves, heretics, etc.) that affects how people view the character.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.lost-worlder.de: From a newly rediscovered Lost World, struggles to fit into the changed culture.
Owes a binding oath of service to a person or group beyond normal obligations.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.obligation.name: Obligation
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.obligation.desc: Has a duty they cannot avoid, without receiving anything in return.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.orphan.name: Orphan
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.orphan.descript: Lacks family ties, a crucial social safety net in the Fading Suns universe.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.stigma.name: Stigma
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.stigma.descript: Has a physical or social mark that causes revulsion, suspicion, or fear.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.vow.name: Vow
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.vow.description: Has taken a serious vow to give something up.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.ally.name: Ally
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.ally.descriptio: (1-11 pts) Has a close relationship with someone in a position of power. Cost varies.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.contact.name: Contact
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.contact.descrip: Has an acquaintance who helps out in little ways (information, a place to stay).
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.family-ties.des: Can draw on exceptionally loyal allies of similar status. This also implies obligations.
Has a series of informants who provide updates on certain areas of information.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.protection.name: Protection
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.protection.desc: Someone (or a group) is looking out for the character.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.retinue.name: Retinue
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.dependent.name: Dependent
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.dependent.descr: Somebody (an elderly family member, a child) relies a great deal on the character.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.vendetta.name: Vendetta
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.vendetta.descri: (1-4 pts) Has earned an unyielding enemy who will do everything in their power to make life difficult.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.jumpkey.name: Jumpkey
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.jumpkey.descrip: Holds coordinates for a jumproute between two planets. Cherished by Charioteers.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.passage-contrac: A pre-existing arrangement for passage on starships.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.refuge.name: Refuge
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.refuge.descript: A safe place the character can go to.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.advisor.name: Advisor
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.advisor.descrip: A hand-held think machine with an artificial intelligence.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.flux-sword.name: Flux Sword
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.flux-sword.desc: An energy sword, using a more advanced variation on blaster and energy shield tech.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.mist-sword.name: Mist Sword
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.mist-sword.desc: A flux sword that can be psychically attuned to its wielder.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.neural-disrupte: A deadly and banned weapon that harms a victim’s brain cells.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.psi-cloak.name: Psi Cloak
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.psi-cloak.descr: Advanced 2nd Republic tech that provides its wearer defense against psychic attacks.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.wireblade.name: Wireblade
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.wireblade.descr: A monomolecular blade that can easily slice through ceramsteel.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.adept-robes.des: The famed armor of the Brother Battle order. A ceramsteel suit powered by fusion.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.article-of-fait: (1 pt per +1 bonus) An item that aids a theurge in a particular rite.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.saints-lore.des: (2 pts per rite + 1 per level) A miraculous item esteemed by all the faithful.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.vestments.name: Vestments
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.vestments.descr: Properly blessed Church equipment — robes, rosaries, miters.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.wyrd-tabernacle: (2 pts per 1 Wyrd) A holy vessel of spiritual energy.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.cash.name: Cash
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.cash.descriptio: Starts the game with a sum of firebirds.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.assets.name: Assets
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.assets.descript: Has real wealth (land, business) providing regular income.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.indebted.name: Indebted
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.cohort-badge.de: An Imperial Cohort, aide to a Questing Knight. Grants stipend and legal powers.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.commission.name: Commission
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.commission.desc: A member of a guild within the Merchant League.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.coven.name: Coven
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.coven.descripti: A member of a psychic coven. Grants access to training and aid, but also obligations.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.householder.des: Employed or closely associated with a noble house, guild, or sect.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.imperial-charte: Granted to Questing Knights. Grants stipend, legal immunity, and authority.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.nobility.name: Nobility
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.nobility.descri: A member of a noble house.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.ordained.name: Ordained
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.ordained.descri: An ordained minister of the Universal Church.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.professional-co: (1-10 pts) A contract with a guild to learn guild-specific skills. Cost varies.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.barbarian.name: Barbarian
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.barbarian.descr: Comes from an uncivilized upbringing and struggles to fit into spacefaring society.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.bastard.name: Bastard
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.bastard.descrip: A bastard child of a noble. Can still buy a noble title but receives no inheritance.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.black-sheep.des: The black sheep of the family, currently being ostracized.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.branded.name: Branded
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.branded.descrip: Sports an unerasable brand for a crime (theft, heresy, etc.).
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.escaped-serf.de: Is actually a serf, not a freeman. Must hide this fact or risk capture.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.escaped-slave.d: Has escaped from slavery and is on the run from everyone.
Has been excommunicated by the Church. Denied grace and considered an outcast.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.fallen-from-gra: Has lost face before peers and superiors in a guild or sect.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.outlaw.name: Outlaw
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.outlaw.descript: (1-4 pts) Has a price on their head. Hunted by authorities.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.secrets.level.l: Discovered a secret coven of psychics.
Know the members of the Imperial Eye on your homeworld.
Found a cache of Second Republic goods.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.well-traveled.l: Has the equivalent of Folk Lore 1 for every major planet in a Royal House’s fiefs.
Has the equivalent of Folk Lore 1 for every major planet in the Known Worlds.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.addiction.optio: Substance must be had twice weekly.
Substance is difficult to find (rare or illegal).
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.dark-secret.lev: Example: Skipped out on your wife and kids.
Example: You help run a coven.
Example: Tried to assassinate Emperor Alexius.
Will aid in major dealings in exchange for same.
Will risk life in exchange for a great boon.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.obligation.leve: Requires the character be on a certain planet for holy days.
Puts the character’s life at risk.
Sworn to uncover the heresies of a Brother Battle leader.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.passage-contrac: Share a room with nine other passengers.
Made for two, holds eight or more.
Must work very hard to pay off.
Risks losing fief and thus rank.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.indebted.option: The Scravers are sending over boys with bats.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.black-sheep.lev: Do not step foot in court or family holdings.
Cut off from the family fortune.
Loss of rank and family name.
ADAX-FS2.items.benefices.fallen-from-gra: Do not conduct guild business or enter the sect’s churches.
You have no more guild or church benefits.
You know too much or took something of value with you.
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.weaponTypes.label: Weapon Type
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.weaponSkills.label: Skill
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.itemSizes.label: Size
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.damage.label: Damage
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.init.label: Init.
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.goal.label: Goal Mod.
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.rangeShort.label: Short Range
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.rangeLong.label: Long Range
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.strReq.label: Str. Req.
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.rate.label: Rate of Fire
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.shots.label: Shots
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.notes.label: Notes
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.armorTypes.label: Armor Type
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.defense.label: Defense
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.dexPenalty.label: Dex. Penalty
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.vigorPenalty.label: Vigor Penalty
ADAX-FS2.sheet.inventory.title: Inventory
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.knife.name: Knife
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.knife.description: The only thing most peasants are allowed by law to carry. Can be anything from a turkey carver to a mammoth survival knife.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.spring-knife.name: Spring Knife
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.spring-knife.desc: The blade stays concealed in the hilt until its user presses a button. These aren’t tools.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.dirk.name: Dirk
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.dirk.description: A large knife or short sword, depending on the manufacture.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.main-gauche.name: Main gauche
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.rapier.name: Rapier
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.rapier.descriptio: The most popular melee weapon in the Known Worlds. It is elegant and light, perfect for fencing.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.broadsword.name: Broadsword
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.broadsword.descri: A heavy sword favored by certain soldiers.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.scimitarkatana.de: A curved sword with one or two edges.
A mammoth sword, modeled after the Scottish claymore.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.glankesh-vorox-sw: A deadly crescent blade of superior craftsmanship made by the Vorox.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.axe.name: Axe
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.axe.description: This could be a battle axe or a simple woodcutter’s tool.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.spear.name: Spear
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.spear.description: An old favorite, spears have made a comeback on many worlds.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.staff.name: Staff
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.staff.description: Could be a quarterstaff, a bo staff, or just about any long stick.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.club.name: Club
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.club.description: Used by peasants and Zen masters alike, a club is an equal-opportunity weapon.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.mace.name: Mace
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.mace.description: A metal ball or long-handled hammer. A very mean club.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.flail.name: Flail
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.flail.description: Two long sticks connected by a chain. Can be a medieval weapon or a nunchaku.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.whip.name: Whip
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.suresnake-whip.de: A whip with a special tracking wire and a nanite computer in the tip that can home in on a chosen target.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.garrote.name: Garrote
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.garrote.descripti: A favorite assassin’s weapon, used to strangle people.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.frap-stick.name: Frap Stick
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.frap-stick.descri: A simple stick with an electric tip often used by thugs.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.wireblade.name: Wireblade
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.wireblade.descrip: A monomolecular blade, the height of Second Republic weapon technology.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.flux-sword.name: Flux Sword
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.flux-sword.descri: An energy sword. At the flick of a switch, a sword-shaped force field is created which instantly fills with plasma.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.mist-sword.name: Mist Sword
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.mist-sword.descri: A Flux Sword which is psychically attuned to the wielder.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.knife-thrown.name: Knife (Thrown)
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.knife-thrown.desc: Throwing knives are specially balanced to fly through the air.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.star.name: Star
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.star.description: A small disk with serrated edges, like a shuriken.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.dart.name: Dart
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.dart.description: A pointed needle with small feathers, larger and more deadly than the bar room variety.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.rock.name: Rock
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.rock.description: Anyone can pick up a rock and throw it.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.hunting-bow.name: Hunting Bow
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.hunting-bow.descr: A 60 lb. pull bow designed to be drawn and fired quickly.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.long-bow.name: Long Bow
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.long-bow.descript: A 90 lb. pull bow designed for warfare, as tall or taller than most people.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.target-bow.name: Target Bow
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.target-bow.descri: A 45 lb. pull bow designed for target shooting rather than for killing.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.hand-crossbow.des: A small, hand-held 45 lb. pull crossbow.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.medium-crossbow.d: A 90 lb. pull bow, standard for most low-tech but important guardsmen.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.heavy-crossbow.de: A 120 lb. pull used for warfare.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.derringer.name: Derringer
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.derringer.descrip: A palm-sized gun designed to be hidden.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.lt-revolver.name: Lt Revolver
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.lt-revolver.descr: Small pistols popular as civilian sidearms.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.lt-autofeed.name: Lt Autofeed
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.lt-autofeed.descr: Equivalent of a twentieth century .32 automatic.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.med-revolver.name: Med Revolver
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.med-revolver.desc: Much like a twentieth century .38 special.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.med-autofeed.name: Med Autofeed
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.med-autofeed.desc: Think of a 9mm Browning or similar pistol.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.hvy-revolver.name: Hvy Revolver
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.hvy-revolver.desc: Like the twentieth century .44 magnum, these heavy guns can bring down large animals.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.hvy-autofeed.name: Hvy Autofeed
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.imperial-rifle.de: The standard armored trooper is given this cheap but well-manufactured assembly-line rifle.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.assault-rifle.des: Think of any number of twentieth century assault rifles, from an M-16 to an AK-47.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.sniper-rifle.name: Sniper Rifle
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.sniper-rifle.desc: Sleek and accurate rifles, most use bolt action.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.smg.name: SMG
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.smg.description: A fully-automatic gun similar to twentieth century Uzis or Macs.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.palm-laser.name: Palm Laser
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.palm-laser.descri: A derringer-sized laser, used for self-defense.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.laser-pistol.name: Laser Pistol
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.laser-pistol.desc: The standard laser handgun of the Known Worlds.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.laser-rifle.name: Laser Rifle
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.laser-rifle.descr: The most popular laser rifle model.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.blaster-rifle.des: A more dangerous version of the blaster pistol.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.blaster-shotgun.d: An awesomely deadly weapon, firing a scattering discharge of plasma balls.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.screecher.name: Screecher
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.screecher.descrip: A sonic gun, emitting a concussive force and a high-pitched squeal.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.flamegun.name: Flamegun
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.flamegun.descript: A popular weapon among Avestites, it sprays burning Ka-plant oil.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.stunner.name: Stunner
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.stunner.descripti: Emits a concussive force field which causes nervous system shock.
Fires a stream of energy which causes destruction to nerve cells and brain matter.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.lt-machinegun.des: One of the more common support weapons currently available.
Often used for squad support. Damage varies based on grenade type.
ADAX-FS2.items.weapons.rocketeer.name: Rocketeer
A point and shoot weapon. Damage varies based on missile type.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.padded-clothing.de: Simple padded clothing offering minimal protection.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.heavy-cloth.name: Heavy cloth
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.heavy-cloth.descri: Thick, heavy fabric providing basic protection.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.polymer-knit.name: Polymer Knit
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.polymer-knit.descr: Advanced polymer weave, effective against slugs.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.spacesuit.name: Spacesuit
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.spacesuit.descript: A standard, unarmored spacesuit for extra-vehicular activity.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.leather-jerkin.des: A sleeveless jacket made of hardened leather.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.synthsilk.name: Synthsilk
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.synthsilk.descript: A light and flexible but surprisingly resistant synthetic silk fabric.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.studded-leather.de: Leather armor reinforced with metal studs.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.half-plate.name: Half plate
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.half-plate.descrip: A combination of chainmail with metal plates covering vital areas.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.plastic-armor.name: Plastic Armor
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.plastic-armor.desc: Armor made from high-density ballistic plastics.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.scale-mail.name: Scale mail
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.scale-mail.descrip: A coat of overlapping metal scales, offering good protection at the cost of flexibility.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.stiffsynth.name: Stiffsynth
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.stiffsynth.descrip: A rigid synthetic material providing excellent protection.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.chain-mail.name: Chain mail
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.chain-mail.descrip: A mesh of interlocking metal rings.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.plastic-mesh.name: Plastic mesh
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.plastic-mesh.descr: A lighter, more flexible version of chain mail made from advanced plastics.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.armor-mesh-spacesu: A spacesuit reinforced with protective mesh.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.plate.name: Plate
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.plate.description: Full body armor made of interlocking metal plates.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.plastic-plate.name: Plastic Plate
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.plastic-plate.desc: Lighter, more advanced full body armor made from ballistic plastics.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.ceramsteel.name: Ceramsteel
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.ceramsteel.descrip: The pinnacle of personal armor, made from ceramic-steel alloys. Often powered.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.adept-robes.name: Adept Robes
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.adept-robes.descri: The famed powered armor of the Brother Battle order. The ultimate in battlefield protection.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.frictionless-gel.d: A layer of gel worn under armor to absorb impacts.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.buckler.name: Buckler
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.buckler.descriptio: A small shield strapped to the forearm, used for parrying.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.large-shield.name: Large shield
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.large-shield.descr: A large shield held in the hand, offering substantial cover.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.dueling-shield.des: A personal energy shield that is easily concealable.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.assault-shield.des: A rare and powerful shield with a wider field.
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.battle-shield.name: Battle Shield
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.psi-cloak.name: Psi Cloak
ADAX-FS2.items.armors.psi-cloak.descript: Advanced 2nd Republic tech that provides defense against psychic attacks and neural disrupters.
ADAX-FS2.itemSheet.maneuverTypes.label: Maneuver Type
ADAX-FS2.compendium.maneuvers.label: Combat Maneuvers
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.fist.name: Fist
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.kick.name: Kick
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.grapple.name: Grapple
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.grapple.descrip: If successful, roll Str+Vigor vs target’s Str+Vigor. If successful, target is grappled; attacker can deliver grapple DMG per turn.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.charge.name: Charge
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.charge.descript: If successful, attacker and target are knocked down. Add 1d6 DMG per 3m run.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.dodge.name: Dodge
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.dodge.descripti: Subtract successes from opponent’s attack successes.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.martial-hold.de: If successful, roll Dx+Fight vs target’s Str+Vigor to grapple.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.head-butt.name: Head Butt
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.head-butt.descr: Attacker takes DMG exceeding their Endurance.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.block.name: Block
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.block.descripti: As Dodge. If successful, add 3 successes to resist attacks.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.confuse-foe.des: -1 per victory point to opponent’s block, dodge or parry for attacker’s next action.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.disengage.name: Disengage
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.martial-throw.d: If successful, roll Dx+Fight vs target’s Str+Vigor. Target is thrown 1m/success. Add 1d6 DMG/3m thrown.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.rooting.name: Rooting
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.rooting.descrip: +3 successes to resist being knocked over.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.claw-fist.name: Claw Fist
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.claw-fist.descr: A precise strike targeting vulnerable points.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.sure-fist.name: Sure Fist
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.choke-hold.name: Choke Hold
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.choke-hold.desc: After three turns of grappling, roll Str+Vigor vs target’s End+Vigor. If successful, target falls unconscious.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.bear-hug.name: Bear Hug
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.bear-hug.descri: Can roll DMG each turn until target escapes.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.iron-body.name: Iron Body
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.iron-body.descr: Attacking opponent takes 1 DMG per victory pt from defender’s blocking roll.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.speed-fist.name: Speed Fist
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.trip-kick.name: Trip Kick
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.trip-kick.descr: Roll vs. target’s Dx+Vigor. If successful, target is knocked down.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.throw-group.des: Roll vs. target’s attack roll. Can throw one attacker per Fight rating.
Block opponent’s attack. If successful, roll Martial Fist or Kick attack with no multiple action penalty.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.slide-kick.name: Slide Kick
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.slide-kick.desc: Compare attacker successes +3 vs target’s Dx+Vigor roll; if target loses, he is knocked down.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.power-fist.name: Power Fist
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.power-fist.desc: Option: Spend Wyrd to add DMG (1W per 1d6, up to 3 max.)
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.vital-strike.de: Roll complementary Per+Physick; add victory dice to DMG.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.banga-charge.de: If successful, attacker and target knocked down. Add 2d6 DMG/3 m run.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.drox.name: Drox
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.drox.descriptio: Allows a second action (using another limb) with no multiple action penalty.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.throx.name: Throx
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.throx.descripti: Allows a third action (using another limb) with no multiple action penalty.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.parry.name: Parry
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.parry.descripti: Roll victory dice + weapon DMG as armor.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.thrust.name: Thrust
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.slash.name: Slash
Opponent’s goal is reduced by 1 per victory pt.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.flat-of-blade.d: A non-lethal strike. No victory dice are added.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.draw-&-strike.d: Draw sword and strike in same action.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.disarm.name: Disarm
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.disarm.descript: If successful, roll Dx+Melee vs. target’s Str+Melee to disarm.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.feint.name: Feint
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.off-hand.name: Off-hand
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.off-hand.descri: Suffer no penalties for off-hand weapons.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.parryriposte.de: Parry opponent’s attack. If successful, roll attack with no multiple action penalty.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.cloak.name: Cloak
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.cloak.descripti: Parry with a cloak in the off-hand.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.florentine.name: Florentine
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.florentine.desc: One attack and one parry without multiple action penalties.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.athletic-strike: Perform athletic feat (swing from chandelier) in same action with no multiple action penalty.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.pierce.name: Pierce
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.pierce.descript: Ignore target’s physical armor (not energy shields).
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.double-strike.d: Attack with primary and off-hand weapon in same action (roll both attacks separately).
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.shield-parry.de: Roll victory dice + shield defense dice as armor.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.shield-attack.d: Ram shield into target; inflict shield DMG.
Character parries with shield and attacks in same turn without suffering multiple action penalties.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.aim.name: Aim
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.aim.description: Maximum bonus is +3 (more if a sight is used). Goal bonus is per turn.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.hipshot.name: Hipshot
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.hipshot.descrip: Only for first shot of combat with a handgun.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.empty-clip.name: Empty clip
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.empty-clip.desc: Fire the entire clip. +3 successes against dodges only.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.spread.name: Spread
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.spread.descript: Spread up to 5m, anyone in targeted area must dodge or get hit. Goal penalty is per meter.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.snapshot.name: Snapshot
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.snapshot.descri: Can be performed with a dodge for no penalty.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.quick-reload.de: Reload clip and fire; no multiple action penalty.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.quick-draw.name: Quick draw
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.quick-draw.desc: Draw gun and fire in same action.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.off-hand-shot.d: Suffer no penalties for off-hand handgun.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.recock.name: Recock
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.recock.descript: Recock rifle or shotgun and fire in same action.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.roll-&-shoot.de: Roll up to 3 meters in any direction.
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.two-gun.name: Two Gun
ADAX-FS2.items.maneuvers.two-gun.descrip: One shot from each handgun; no multiple action penalty.
